Detailed Description

Common interface for all calibration objects.

It is used to work with real world units. It provides only two simple operations: distance computation and local transformation.

Definition at line 22 of file ICalibration.h.

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum iview::ICalibration::CalcStatus

Describe a computation status for calibration methods.

Enumerator:
CS_FAILED 

There was no possibility to calculte result value.

CS_INVALID 

Result value is calculated, but it is invalid.

Result value can be used only temporary, but it doesn't represent valid position.

CS_OK 

Result value is valid.

Definition at line 28 of file ICalibration.h.
